name: list folder
description: Lists the contents of a specified folder/directory.

status.description: Indicates the result of the list operation

path.description: The folder path that was listed

contents.description: List of files/folders contained in the specified directory

code:
import os, json

path = input_data['path']
try:
    contents = os.listdir(path)
    output = json.dumps({'status': 'success', 'path': path, 'contents': contents})
except Exception as e:
    output = json.dumps({'status': 'error', 'path': '', 'contents': [], 'message': str(e)})
